General.Name: GuangDong Leary New Material Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: GuangDong Leary New Material Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of functional coating films and application products in China. The company offers low voltage differential signal shield films, electronic/auto FFC hot melt adhesive films, polyester supporting tapes, hi-speed transmission films, lithium battery aluminum plastic films, and LED flexible circuit board films. Its products are used in 3C, automotive electronics, LED lighting, lithium batteries, semiconductor products, and other fields. GuangDong Leary New Material Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Foshan, China.

5.Name: Ms. Yunxiang  Liang
